00035 namespace {
00036   const int BUFFER_SIZE = 32768;
00037 }

00040 const char *CommandCopyFromLocal::ms_usage[] = {
00041   "copyFromLocal <src> <dst>",
00042   "",
00043   "  This program copies the local file <src> to the remote",
00044   "  file <dst> in the DFS.",
00045   (const char *)0

00049 void CommandCopyFromLocal::run() {
00050   DispatchHandlerSynchronizer sync_handler;
00051   int32_t fd = 0;
00052   EventPtr event_ptr;
00053   FILE *fp = 0;
00054   size_t nread;
00055   int src_arg = 0;
00056   uint8_t *buf;
00057   StaticBuffer send_buf;
00058 
00059   if (m_args.size() != 2)
00060     HT_THROW(Error::PARSE_ERROR, "Wrong number of arguments.  Type 'help' for usage.");
00061 
00062   try {
00063 
00064     if ((fp = fopen(m_args[src_arg].first.c_str(), "r")) == 0)
00065       HT_THROW(Error::EXTERNAL, strerror(errno));
00066 
00067     fd = m_client->create(m_args[src_arg+1].first, true, -1, -1, -1);
00068 
00069     // send 3 appends
00070     for (int i=0; i<3; i++) {
00071       buf = new uint8_t [BUFFER_SIZE];
00072       if ((nread = fread(buf, 1, BUFFER_SIZE, fp)) == 0)
00073         goto done;
00074       send_buf.set(buf, nread, true);
00075       m_client->append(fd, send_buf, 0, &sync_handler);
00076     }
00077 
00078     while (true) {
00079 
00080       if (!sync_handler.wait_for_reply(event_ptr))
00081         HT_THROW(event_ptr->error, event_ptr->to_str());
00082 
00083       buf = new uint8_t [BUFFER_SIZE];
00084       if ((nread = fread(buf, 1, BUFFER_SIZE, fp)) == 0)
00085         break;
00086       send_buf.set(buf, nread, true);
00087       m_client->append(fd, send_buf, 0, &sync_handler);
00088     }
00089 
00090   done:
00091     m_client->close(fd);
00092 
00093   }
00094   catch (Exception &e) {
00095     if (fp)
00096       fclose(fp);
00097     HT_THROW(e.code(), e.what());
00098   }
00099 }
